mapper.sql: id, wms_id, data_num, cur_day, cur_time, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, product_id, product_name, stock_place_code, stock_place, batch_code, aqty, product_date, expiry_date, in_time, fees_no, dbname, temperature, weight, volume, pallet_num, piece_num, is_calculated, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time,write_time,calculate_time, del_flag, extattr1, extattr2, extattr3, extattr4, extattr5
mapper.select: select a.id, a.wms_id, a.data_num, a.cur_day, a.cur_time, a.warehouse_code, a.warehouse_name, a.customerid, a.customer_name, a.product_id, a.product_name, a.stock_place_code, a.stock_place, a.batch_code, a.aqty, a.product_date, a.expiry_date, a.in_time, a.fees_no, a.dbname, a.temperature, a.weight, a.volume, a.pallet_num, a.piece_num, b.calcu_msg as remark, a.creator, a.create_time, a.last_modifier, a.last_modify_time,a.write_time,b.calculate_time, a.del_flag, a.extattr1, a.extattr2, a.extattr3, a.extattr4, a.extattr5, b.is_calculated from biz_product_storage a left join fees_receive_storage b on a.fees_no = b.fees_no and b.del_flag='0' where 1=1 and a.del_flag='0'
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_product_storage(wms_id, data_num, cur_day, cur_time, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, product_id, product_name, stock_place_code, stock_place, batch_code, aqty, product_date, expiry_date, in_time, fees_no, dbname, temperature, weight, volume, pallet_num, piece_num, is_calculated, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time,write_time, calculate_time, del_flag) values (
#{wmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockPlaceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{palletNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pieceNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select data_num from biz_product_storage where del_flag = 0 and is_calculated = 1
LIMIT 1
mapper.update:
update fees_receive_storage set is_calculated = 99, calcu_msg='' where fees_no in
#{item}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.wms_id, a.data_num, a.cur_day, a.cur_time, a.warehouse_code, a.warehouse_name, a.customerid, a.customer_name, a.product_id, a.product_name, a.stock_place_code, a.stock_place, a.batch_code, a.aqty, a.product_date, a.expiry_date, a.in_time, a.fees_no, a.dbname, a.temperature, a.weight, a.volume, a.pallet_num, a.piece_num, a.remark, a.creator, a.create_time, a.last_modifier, a.last_modify_time,a.write_time,a.calculate_time, a.del_flag, a.extattr1, a.extattr2, a.extattr3, a.extattr4, a.extattr5, b.is_calculated from biz_product_storage a left join fees_receive_storage b on a.fees_no = b.fees_no and b.del_flag = 0 where a.is_calculated =1 and a.del_flag = 0
mapper.update:
update biz_product_storage a left JOIN fees_receive_storage b on a.fees_no=b.fees_no set a.del_flag='4',b.del_flag='1' where a.del_flag='0' and b.del_flag='0' and a.create_time>=#{beginTime} and a.create_time<#{endTime} and a.customerid in
#{item}
